p: In the Flaviviridae family, vaccines are available for the yellow fever virus (YFV) and Japanese encephalitis virus (JEV). There are two types of JEV vaccine â€“ a live attenuated vaccine SA14-14-2 [ 46] and a genetically engineered vaccine in which two surface proteins are recombined with a weakened YFV strain [ 47]. None exist for the Zika or Dengue viruses.
